summary: This is a Chinese Translation of Di0nysus's mod Apotheosis - Lifeless Vaults,only esp & esm included
descriptionHtml:
This is a Chinese Translation of Di0nysus's quest mod[b] [size=3][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66021/?]Apotheosis - Lifeless Vaults[/url][/u][/size][/b](linked to the mod page),only esp & esm included

That means you still need the original mod to play.

Have to say this mod brings me fun and exciting experience,hope you guys would like it too!

Credits

[b][size=3]Di0nysus [/size][/b]for this great mod!

Model Resources
Vicn Creature Resource by [b]Vicn[/b]T67
Statue Dwarven by [b]Tony67

[/b]Music  
Bloodborne "Airborne Assault" (Original song inspired by Bloodborne) by [b]Alex Roe [/b]
author: Di0nysus
